quote: I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health.
author: Voltaire

quote: You don’t have to be happy every second to be happy overall.
author: Unknown

quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Find a balance between work and play.
author: Unknown

quote: The groundwork for all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Stop chasing after the wrong things and start chasing after the right things.
author: Unknown

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Be the reason someone smiles today.
author: Unknown

quote: Laughing decreases blood pressure and increases blood flow.
author: Unknown

quote: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor’s book.
author: Irish proverb

quote: A healthy mind resides in a healthy body.
author: Roman proverb

quote: Take care of your body, it is the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Find your passion and pursue it with a healthy attitude.
author: Unknown

quote: Prioritize your mental health as much as your physical health.
author: Unknown

quote: Invest in your health, it's the best investment you'll ever make.
author: Unknown
